Dear ${object.name.parents1_id.name or ''},

Greetings!

We have received your request for TC for your ward(s). The details of the TC status and outstanding balance (if any) are appended in the table below this email. You can pay the TC fees online via the link provided below the TC status table. This is a secure link for fee payment and you will receive an acknowledgement immediately, both on the website and over email, detailing next steps. Our secure payment gateway is provided by payFort, the most trusted online payment gateway in the Middle East and UAE. PayFort transaction charges may apply and the link shall display the total payable amount.

Alternatively, you can visit the school with a printout of this mail (or note the TC request number) and contact the Registrar on any working day (Sunday or Thursday from 8:00 a.m. to 3:30 p.m, Saturday 8:00 a.m. to 1:00 p.m) and pay the fee at the school counter. We encourage you to pay the fees online so that you do not have to wait for significant duration during school visit.

Please feel free to write to us on registrar.apple@iqraeducation.net should you have any queries.

Best Regards
Registrar, The Apple International School, Dubai
Email : registrar.apple@iqraeducation.net
Link : http://www.apple.iqraeducation.net
Phone: +971 4 263 8989
Fax : +971 4 2619554
